data.title: The Hammer: An IDL Spectral Typing Suite
data.name: TheHammer
data.description: The Hammer: An IDL Spectral Typing Suite

evidence: "The Hammer spectral typing algorithm was originally developed for use on late-type SDSS spectra, but has subsequently been modified to allow it to classify spectra in a variety of formats with targets spanning the MK spectral sequence."
"The Hammer processes a list of input spectra by automatically estimating each object's spectral type and measuring activity and metallicity tracers in late type stars."
"The distribution provided above contains a README file to explain the usage of routine, as well as a small set of spectra and associated output files to demonstrate the usage of the code."
